{"id":1047262587,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1694505050,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"19 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1047262587/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Buy Two Chocolates","memory":"46.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int buyChoco(vector<int>& prices, int money) {\n        sort(prices.begin(), prices.end());\n        for (auto i = 1; i < prices.size(); i++) {\n            prices[i - 1] = prices[i - 1] + prices[i];\n        }\n        prices.pop_back();\n        if (money < prices[0])\n            return money;\n        int res = money - prices[0];\n        for (auto i : prices) {\n            if (money - i >= 0)\n                res = max(res, money - i);\n        }\n\n\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"buy-two-chocolates","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
